detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract ArtemisFinance (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#34-192) has payable functions:
	 - ArtemisFinance.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#189-191)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [ArtemisFinance](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#L34-L192) has payable functions:
	 - [ArtemisFinance.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#L189-L191)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description: Variable ArtemisFinance._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#39) is not in mixedCase

ArtemisFinance.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#53-61) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 100000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ArtemisFinance.sol#57)
